name: grubbily
content:
grubbily adverb
(DIRTY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is dirty or that shows you do not care about being clean: The coins are covered with fingerprints from all the people who have grubbily handled them over the years. If I had known we were having company, I wouldn't have dressed so grubbily.
